system.effect: Trigger - The user uses Stockpile, Surf, or Dive\nConnection - Stockpile. The next time the user is damaged, it rolls an AC 4 Physical Attack against the attacker, even if the user Faints. On a hit, the target loses 2 ticks of HP. In addition, if the hit roll was successful, on an even roll the target is Paralyzed; on an odd roll, the target instead loses 1 Defense CS.
